questions.prompt: What did Peter draw on his window.
questions.wrong_answer_msg: Peter drew a snowflake on his window.

questions.intro: While getting ready for the day Peter gets his scarf, but couldn't find one of his mittens.
questions.wrong_answer_msg: Peter's mom finds the mitten behind the cookie jar.

questions.intro: Peter was told to help his grandma bring food over for the party that night.
questions.prompt: What food was Peter's grandma bringing.
questions.wrong_answer_msg: Peter's grandma was bringing mac 'n' cheese.

questions.intro: After putting on his snow suit, Peter went outside and ran into Nathan.
questions.prompt: What did Nathan say today is the perfect day for.
questions.wrong_answer_msg: Nathan says it's the perfect day for singing. He has a great voice.

questions.intro: As Peter headed over to his grandma's, a bird watches him.
questions.prompt: What type of bird watches Peter.
questions.wrong_answer_msg: A bright red northern cardinal was looking at Peter; they're so pretty.

questions.intro: Peter met Nathan who sells chestnuts and said he can't spend the holidays with his family who live far away.
questions.prompt: Which of the following places are not where Nathan's family live.
questions.correct_answer_msg: California is a bit far for the subway.
questions.wrong_answer_msg: Nathan has family in California and Philadelphia. So Florida was the right answer.

questions.intro: Peter met Mrs. Lee who was shoveling snow outside her shop.
questions.prompt: What present did Peter tell Mrs. Lee he wanted.
questions.correct_answer_msg: I want one too! Sledding is so much fun!

questions.intro: Layla ran into Peter who said he is rescuing nana's mac 'n' cheese from a dragon.
questions.prompt: What character did Peter say he was.
questions.wrong_answer_msg: Peter pretended a stick he found was a sword, and that he was a knight.

questions.intro: Layla donated a gift as part of her family tradition.
questions.prompt: What did Peter put in the donation box.
questions.correct_answer_msg: It's nice to give to those in need.
questions.wrong_answer_msg: Peter donated his scarf. It's nice to give to those in need.

questions.intro: Peter and everyone in the neighborhood had a snowball fight.
questions.prompt: What happened to the sled with the gifts and macaroni.
questions.wrong_answer_msg: The sled broke in the playground.
answers: it was hit by a snow plow

questions.intro: Last question! Near the end of the party, Peter gets the door but no one was there, except for a gift, a new saucer.
questions.prompt: Who gave Peter the new saucer.
questions.correct_answer_msg: Looks like you got the hint from the message, from one knight to another. Nice!
questions.wrong_answer_msg: The gift had the message, from one knight to another. It was Ahmed.
